content.en_US:
Aviation-tier fuel that is useful throughout the mod. It is obtained by [[fractioning|Fractioning Tower]] [[light oil|Light Oil]] or [[cracking|Catalytic Cracking Tower]] [[diesel|Diesel]], and it can be further cracked into [[petroleum gas|Petroleum Gas]]. Main use of kerosene is to power jetpacks, missiles, fuselages, thrusters, and rockets.

It is mixed in the [[industrial mixer|Industrial Mixer]] to obtain jet fuel or NITAN 100 octane super fuel. In the assembly plant, kerosene fluid barrels are used to craft [[satellites|Satellites]].

Kerosene is used in [[PUREX|PUREX]] to purify spent fuel.
